Home.FillOutYourDID: Fill out your decentralized identifier (DID) to get started.
Home.Subtitle: Here is your verifiable credential. You can copy it to your clipboard and save manually. Support for QR code import is coming soon.
Home.Title: A unique identity that belongs to you. There are many providers of DIDs and you are free to choose anyone you want.
